# What is Algae?
Algae is a specialised medicine using modified strains of the algae naturally found on Trieste. Some important facts to know are:
1. They last a long time
2. In the right circumstances, they can heal extremely quickly
3. How effective they are is based upon body temp
## How to grow algae
Benefical algal strains are primarily derived from activated algae.
To "Activate" algae, you will need some carbon, oxygen, feedstock, sea water (to get the algae in the first place), and a important ingredient called dormant organics.
To get dormant organics, heat a medicine up untill it denatures. I recommend inaprovaline
This will net you some denatured protiens, which you can run through a centrifuge for some basic elements and some dormant organics.
